thread.title: Rough forecast: AI to increase deadly waste by millions of tons
thread.title_full: Rough forecast: AI to increase deadly waste by millions of tons

author: Anna Helakallio
title: Rough forecast: AI to increase deadly waste by millions of tons
text:
Artificial intelligence could produce up to 5 million tons of electronic waste by 2030, according to a study published in the journal Nature Computational Science.
Uutinen
Rough forecast: AI to increase deadly waste by millions of tons
Anna Helakallio,
[Artificial Intelligence](/aiheet/artificial-intelligence)[Tivi in English](/aiheet/tivi-in-english)The results are based on forecasts made by researchers.
Anna Helakallio
